fomod.Name: Linear Spell Progression
fomod.Author: BellCube Dev
fomod.Description: Linear Spell Progression is an easily-patched framework for, well, the linear progression of spells. The goal is to remove the cheatiness of things like the Arcane Apparel mod in the Creation Club, which throws a bunch of spells in your face. Instead of simply buying the best spell tome—or grabbing it out of a chest—you will first need to learn other, more basic spells to achieve the desired effect.
